summary: Cyrus the Restless is the Maverick Sword of the Crown, Hero of Hammerfell, and, some say, a saint or even god of his own right. Adds this famous character from The Elder Scrolls Adventures: Redguard to Skyrim as a follower. Features new textures to match his appearance from the original game & lore books.
descriptionHtml:
Cyrus the Restless is the Maverick Sword of the Crown, Hero of Hammerfell, and, some say, a saint or even god of his own right. Adds this famous character from The Elder Scrolls Adventures: Redguard to Skyrim as a follower. Features new textures to match his appearance from the original game & lore books.

Cyrus can be found in Dead Man\'s Drink, the inn at Falkreath since it is near the border of Hammerfell. Near him is his chest containing two books that go into the canon back-story of this character.

This is a small mod primarily designed for those interested in learning some interesting Elder Scrolls lore, while also wanting to obtain a cool new follower. Also good for those who originally played Redguard back in the day and want some nostalgia.



Credits
19wEEdmAstEr25 - Custom scimitar texture - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32466
humannature66 - For the earrings - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11130
ElderScrollsWikia, Uesp, Imperial Library - For lore
Gimp - For enabling me to create the custom Hammerfell garb texture
Bethesda
Nexusmods
author: Faustuss2
